name: express-typescript-starter
description: A starting point for Node.js express apps with TypeScript
author: Bowden Kelly

scripts.build: npm run clean-dist ; npm run build-lambdas
scripts.build-lambdas: parcel build src/lambdas/*/index.ts --out-dir dist/lambdas/ --out-file index.js --no-content-hash --target node --bundle-node-modules
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy-all
scripts.deploy-functions: npm run build && npm run deploy-function-sendEmail && npm run deploy-function-customerRequest
scripts.deploy-function-sendEmail: export AWS_CLIENT_TIMEOUT=100000000 && sls deploy --verbose function --function sendEmail --aws-profile personal
scripts.deploy-function-customerRequest: export AWS_CLIENT_TIMEOUT=100000000 && sls deploy --verbose function --function customerRequest --aws-profile personal
